description: Identifier of the report being shared; links this record to the report catalog.
Sequence number for this share entry within a reportâ€™s recipients; likely used for ordering or uniqueness; confirm with SME.
Recipient identifier granted access, interpreted based on the recipient category (user, group, or all).
Permission level granted to the recipient, such as read-only or edit capability.
Recipient category that defines the sharing scope (individual user, group/workgroup, or entire organization).
User or system that created the share entry.
Date and time the share entry was created (audit timestamp).
User or system that last modified this share entry.
Date and time this share entry was last updated (audit timestamp).
